alert.note: Alert for Eastern Magic Valley; Lower Snake River Plain; Teton Valley; Upper Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freezing Fog Advisory issued November 14 at 6:43AM MST until November 14 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...FREEZING FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST TODAY... * WHAT...Areas of visibility less than one fourth of a mile due to freezing fog. * WHERE...The Snake River plain and eastern Magic Valley, including the Interstate 15, Interstate 84, Interstate 86, and U S Route 20, including Rexburg, Idaho Falls, Blackfoot, Pocatello, American Falls, and Burley. The Teton Valley including the town of Driggs. * WHEN...Until noon MST today. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility and potential frost or icy build up on bridges. This is known as black ice.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Be prepared for sudden changes in visibility while driving. Also, be alert for frost or black ice on bridge decks causing slippery roads.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Magic Valley; Lower Snake River Plain; Teton Valley; Upper Snake River Plain
